headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BROD, SHELDON J.

snippet: BROD--Sheldon J.,78, of NYC, passed away sadly and unexpectedly on February 22, 2016. Devoted husband of Sandy for 48 years, beloved father of Melissa and Rachel, loving father-in-law to David, caring brother to Alan and late sister Lila Arnold. Proud and adorning "Papa" to the lights of his life, Sadie and Ezra. Services Friday, February 26 at 9am, "The Riverside," NYC. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BROD--Sheldon J.,78, of NYC, passed away sadly and unexpectedly on February 22, 2016. Devoted husband of Sandy for 48 years, beloved father of Melissa and Rachel, loving father-in-law to David, caring brother to Alan and late sister Lila Arnold. Proud and adorning "Papa" to the lights of his life, Sadie and Ezra. Services Friday, February 26 at 9am, "The Riverside," NYC. 1/3
